name: UIDynamicAnimatorDelegate
desc: To respond to the pausing or resumption of UIKit dynamic animation, configure a custom class to adopt the UIDynamicAnimatorDelegate protocol. Then, in a dynamic animator (an instance of the UIDynamicAnimator class), set the delegate to be an instance of your custom class.

items.name: func dynamicAnimatorDidPause(UIDynamicAnimator)
items.desc: Called when a dynamic animator pauses the animations for its behaviors’ associated dynamic items.

items.name: func dynamicAnimatorWillResume(UIDynamicAnimator)
items.desc: Called when a dynamic animator is about to resume the animations for its behaviors’ associated dynamic items.
